AgencyHero.subtitle: Tired of high commissions and slow websites? We build beautiful, high-performance platforms for Moroccan hotels and riads, giving you total ownership and direct bookings.

AgencyProblemSolution.solutionTitle: Our Solution: Empowering Your Digital Journey
AgencyProblemSolution.solutionText: We provide a comprehensive, all-in-one platform designed to streamline your operations, boost your online presence, and maximize your revenue. Say goodbye to hidden fees and hello to seamless growth.

AgencyFooter.shortDescription: Driving digital success for businesses with innovative web development and marketing strategies.

AgencyMetadata.title: Upmerce Solutions | High-Performance Websites for Moroccan Tourism
AgencyMetadata.description: We build fast, secure, multi-theme websites for riads, tour operators, and guides in Morocco. Increase your direct bookings and escape commission fees.

StatsSection.title: Our Achievements & Standards
StatsSection.subtitle: We are committed to delivering exceptional quality and measurable results for every client.

AgencyTechnology.title: Our Technology Advantage
AgencyTechnology.subtitle: Discover the stark difference between outdated practices and Upmerce's cutting-edge approach to web development.

oldWay.title: The Old Way
oldWay.performance: Slow loading times and clunky interfaces.
oldWay.security: Vulnerable to cyber threats and data breaches.
oldWay.cost: High initial investment with hidden maintenance fees.

newWay.title: The Upmerce Way
newWay.performance: Blazing-fast performance and seamless user experience.
newWay.cost: Cost-effective solutions with predictable monthly pricing.

AgencyOwnership.title: Your Ownership, Our Priority
AgencyOwnership.subtitle: At Upmerce, we believe in transparency and empowering you with full control over your digital assets.
AgencyOwnership.item1: You own 100% of your website code and assets.
AgencyOwnership.item2: No hidden fees or restrictive contracts.
AgencyOwnership.item3: Full access to your hosting and domain settings.

FaqHub.title: Questions on Your Mind? We Have Answers.
FaqHub.subtitle: Explore our knowledge hub where we tackle the most common questions businesses like yours ask.

AgencyFounder.name: Mustapha Ouazza
AgencyFounder.title: Founder & CEO
AgencyFounder.missionStatement: At Upmerce, our mission is to empower businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions that drive growth and foster meaningful connections. We believe in building more than just websites; we build partnerships for success.
